description: Satisfaction with way democracy works in country
notes: All waves. 4-point scale (1=very satisfied to 4=not at all satisfied). HIGHER=LESS satisfied

description: How much of a democracy is the country
notes: All waves. 4-point scale (1=full democracy to 4=not democracy). HIGHER=LESS democratic
All waves. 10-point scale (1=completely undemocratic to 10=completely democratic). HIGHER=MORE democratic

description: Democracy scale for country 10 years ago
notes: All waves. 10-point scale (1=completely undemocratic to 10=completely democratic). HIGHER=MORE democratic

description: Expected democracy scale 10 years from now
notes: All waves. 10-point scale (1=completely undemocratic to 10=completely democratic). HIGHER=MORE democratic

description: Whether democracy is suitable for our country
notes: All waves. 10-point scale (1=completely unsuitable to 10=perfectly suitable). HIGHER=MORE suitable

description: Democracy is preferable to any other form of government
notes: All waves. 3-choice categorical (1=democracy preferable 2=sometimes non-democratic better 3=doesn't matter). Not ordinal - use categorical
All waves. 4-point scale (1=very satisfied to 4=very dissatisfied). HIGHER=LESS satisfied

description: Support for strong leader who doesn't bother with elections
notes: All waves. 4-choice ordinal (1=strongly support to 4=strongly oppose). HIGHER=LESS authoritarian
All waves. 4-choice ordinal (1=strongly support to 4=strongly oppose). HIGHER=LESS authoritarian

description: Support for experts making decisions instead of government/elections
notes: All waves. 4-choice ordinal (1=strongly support to 4=strongly oppose). HIGHER=LESS authoritarian
